text: General Ã‰variste Ndayishimiye (born 17 June 1959) is a Burundi politician. He is the President of Burundi since 2020. He became president after the death of President Pierre Nkurunziza. He is also the Secretary General of the CNDD-FDD since 2016. He was the Minister of the Interior and Public Security from 2006 to 2007. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Burundi Category:Current national leaders
title: Evariste Ndayishimiye
